author: andschwa
body: This was due to how libcoreclr.so was built. When it was loaded via nested dlopen calls, managed exceptions could not be caught. Jan has fixed this in CoreCLR by fixing the ordering of libunwind in their build system. VSO create date - 12/17/2015 11:55:00     VSO closed date - 12/17/2015 11:56:00
title: Fix PSRP's exception problem
